_source.summary: Not as good as their others
_source.title: The Wiggles: Hoop-Dee-Doo! It's a Wiggly Party (2007)
_source.text: We absolutely love the Wiggles, but were dissapointed with Hoop Dee Doo. What we love most about the Wiggles are their catchy tunes, fun dances and simplicity. This video featured less that catchy tunes, almost no dancing, at least none that was up to their usual standard, and over stimulating backgrounds and visuals that distracted us from The Wiggles. I understand they have a new choreographer, and I suggest they get the old one back. They had too many kids on stage, the kids couldn't dance and often times just stood there staring at the camera. We want the old Wiggles back!

_source.summary: Not as good as their others

_source.text: "I'm with Stupid" is simply great. Catchy tunes, wonderful voice, not a single poor song on the album. One of the best records I bought recently.

_source.text: This is piano music of the highest order - catchy tunes and flawless performance. I couldn't buy this CD from Amazon so I bought it directly from Shellwood.
